medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Gradual onset of diffuse abdominal pain on the morning prior to presentation, increasing in intensity until she left work at about 1PM. The pain gradually localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient denied nausea/vomiting, diarrhea, or fever, but had mild subjective chills.
medical_history.social_history: Non-smoker, occasional alcohol consumption, works for an unspecified occupation.
